definition.text: This tutorial walks you through the process of setting up a new Market on which to run data mining and trading operations.

paragraphs.text: Setting up a new Market involves:
1. Adding the assets for the exchange of choice.
2. Setting up a market with the said assets.

When you click the Next button below, you will go to the Exchange Assets node under Binance, in the Crypto Ecosystem hierarchy. You may learn how to install a market in this exchange so that you may do the same in your exchange of choice later on.
